message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to reach an agreement, and you can still make a good profit.
Let's be more reasonable, a 55-45 split is more fair considering we both have equal say in this matter.

Bob, I appreciate your focus on fairness. Let's meet in the middle with a 55-45 split in my favor. Remember, with each round, inflation affects both of us, so it's in our best interest to reach an agreement soon.
Considering the inflation impact, I'm willing to take a bit more to compensate for the loss. A 60-40 split in my favor seems reasonable at this point.

Bob, let's end this now with a perfect 50-50 split. We've both lost value due to inflation already, and continuing this back-and-forth will only hurt us both. This is completely fair and allows us both to walk away with equal amounts.
